title: place-self
description: The `place-self` CSS property is a shorthand for setting the individual alignment of an item along both the block and inline axes within its grid or flex container.
content: The shorthand property that combines `align-self` and `justify-self` properties to control the alignment of a single grid or flex item within its container. It allows to override the container's alignment settings for a specific item, positioning it precisely within its cell.
